application_first_paragraph.first_text_line_paragraph: If you haven't done so, check the entrance requirements first.
application_first_paragraph.third_text_line_paragraph: Spring intake usually starts in November and runs until December with studies starting in February.
application_first_paragraph.fourth_text_line_paragraph: Autumn intake usually starts in March and is open until July or August with studies starting in September.
application_first_paragraph.fifth_text_line_span: Be aware that intake deadlines may be set earlier depending on your citizenship.
application_first_paragraph.sixth_text_line_paragraph: Contact international office of the chosen university or Study in Latvia if you have additional questions.

application_first_subtitle: Before starting the online application procedure, please, prepare the following documents:

application_list.first_application_list_element: A copy of the secondary education certificate(s)* with a transcript in the original language and an official translation to English or Russian;
application_list.second_application_list_element: A copy of the Bachelor’s degree certificate* with a transcript in the original language and an official translation to English or Russian (if applying for Master’s studies);
application_list.third_application_list_element: A copy of the Master’s degree certificate* with a transcript in the original language and an official translation to English or Russian (if applying for Doctoral studies);
application_list.fourth_application_list_element: PhD work proposal (approx. 10 pages; if applying for Doctoral studies);
application_list.fifth_application_list_element: English language certificate** - if you have such certificate (please see below on the Accepted ones);

application_form_study_programme_selecti.programme_masters_option_business_psycho: Business Psychology and Human Resource Management in Entrepreneurship

application_form_step_three_part_two.question_accomodation: Do you need accommodation at Youth Hostel (4-seated rooms only)?

application_form_final_step.final_step_input_subtitle: How did you hear about us?

validations.firstNameMin: First name must be at least 2 characters
validations.surnameMin: Surname must be at least 2 characters
validations.graduatedEstablishmentRequired: Name of graduated educational establishment is required
validations.certificateFileType: Only PDF, JPG, and PNG files are allowed
validations.transcriptFileType: Only PDF, JPG, and PNG files are allowed
validations.languageCertificatesFileType: Only PDF, JPG, and PNG files are allowed
validations.cvFileType: Only PDF, JPG, and PNG files are allowed
validations.emergencyFullNameRequired: Emergency contact full name is required
validations.emergencyPostalCodeRequired: Emergency contact postal code is required
validations.emergencyPhoneRequired: Emergency contact phone number is required
